name: Beija Floru2122 Body Oasis
about: What it is:A collagen-boosting Beija Floru2122 body care set delivers renewed, replenished skin and finishes with the fruity-floral Cheirosa 68 Perfume Mist..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity.Highlighted Ingredients:- Vegan Collagen: Maintains skinu2019s natural collagen supply..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, and sulfates SLS & SLES. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This three-piece, limited-edition set includes mini sizes of the Elasti Body Wash with hydrating vegan squalane and Elasti-Cream with retinol-mimicking Cacay Oil for cell turnover, plus a full-size Cheirosa 68 Perfume Mist..This Set Contains:- 3 oz/ 90 mL Beija Floru2122 Elasti Body Wash
ingredients: -Vegan Collagen: Maintains skinu2019s natural collagen supply..-Cacay Oil: A gentle retinol alternative that supports cell turnover. .-Plant Squalane: Rapidly plumps the look of skin while intensely hydrating...Beija Floru2122 Elasti Body Wash:.Aqua (Water, Eau), Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Stearic Acid, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Glycol Distearate, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Glycerin, Parfum (Fragrance), Squalane, Caryodendron Orinocense (Cacay) Seed Oil, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Polyquaternium-7, Sodium Isethionate, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Methyltaurate, Xanthan Gum, Phenoxyethanol..Beija Floru2122 Elasti-Cream:.Aqua (Water, Eau), Cetearyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Parfum (Fragrance), Isopentyldiol, Glyceryl Stearate, C13-16 Isoparaffin, Glycerin, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Cetyl Alcohol, Caryodendron Orinocense (Cacay) Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Behenyl Alcohol, Nicotiana Benthamiana Hexapeptide-40 sh-Polypeptide-47 (Collagen Amino Acids), Squalane, Theobroma Grandiflorum (Cupuau00e7u) Seed Butter, Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter, Astrocaryum Vulgare (Tucumu00e3) Kernel Oil, Copaifera Officinalis (Balsam Copaiba) Resin, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Tocopherol, Xanthan Gum, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Heptyl Undecylenate, Pentylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Mica, Benzyl Salicylate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide)...Cheirosa 68 Perfume Mist:.Alcohol Denat., Aqua (Water, Eau), Parfum (Fragrance), Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Salicylate.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Beija Floru2122 Elasti Body Wash:.-Work into wet skin, gently massaging as you go. Its creamy texture transforms into a rich, moisturizing lather. .-Rinse away...Beija Floru2122 Elasti-Cream:.-Massage into skin twice daily using circular motions all over the body...Cheirosa 68 Perfume Mist:.-Spray these mists anywhere and everywhere, including your body, hair, clothes, and even your home..-Mist all the time for a lingering scent of Brazilian jasmine, pink dragonfruit, and sheer vanilla.

reviews.review_text: This product is very good the perfume lasts long I still have the sent after two days on but the only flaw about this product is about the sizes the perfume is the right size but I do with the body wash and lotion was bigger but therthan that the product is amazing and long lasting

reviews.review_text: The perfume literally just smells like if you sprayed vodka on you or something, no floral scent at all. The lotion and body wash smell good but the perfume is bad

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: 68 is my favourite scent and the savings of this set were too good to miss! I looove the fragrance and lotion--they both smell great and last a decent amount of time. I also appreciate the full size of the perfume too. The body wash is really nice and I do like it but I don't know if I would repurchase it for it's regular price--I got it because of the deal but I don't think it's worth it on it's own. I personally am a Dove body wash girl but it was nice to try!! Overall highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A must have ,, beautiful cotton meshes with a sporty scent . This smells reminiscent of Baccarat rouge 540. I love layering all 3 together for a long lasting beautiful fragrance! My skin feels amazing!
I love it and a super gift with great size products.
